tree.name: Oso Ighodaro
tree.tradeDescription: Traded Kevin McCullar Jr. and 2028 2nd round pick (BOS own) to Knicks for Ighodaro (#40 pick)
tree.note: Marquette forward, acquired from Knicks on draft night

assetsGivenUp.name: Kevin McCullar Jr.
assetsGivenUp.note: Kansas guard, drafted 56th overall by Phoenix (received from Denver in Dunn trade), traded same day to NYK
